title: Robert Geyer
text: Robert Geyer (22 October 1899 – 13 October 1982) was a French <a href="middle-distance%20running">middle-distance runner</a>. He competed in the <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%201920%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%203000%20metres%20steeplechase">men's 3000 metres steeplechase</a> at the <a href="1920%20Summer%20Olympics">1920 Summer Olympics</a>.
